column1: #Text=I don't understand why this was supposed to be such a historic moment.
#Text=Females have been elected Prime Ministers in Great Britain and Chancellors in Germany - and many other countries as well i'm sure.
#Text=To be honest, it makes you look even weak to make such a big deal of this.
#Text=I never thought that gender was an issue in politics until this election.
#Text=Race with Obama definitely but gender I didn't think was a big deal.
